article.description: Kendrix Brown hit a jumper with 7 seconds left to propel William & Mary to a 53-52 win over Northeastern on Saturday night.
article.headline: Brown's late jumper puts end to Northeastern's four-game run
article.story: WILLIAMSBURG, Va. -- Kendrix Brown hit a jumper with 7 seconds left to propel William & Mary to a 53-52 win over Northeastern on Saturday night. Danny Sumner scored 14 points to lead the Tribe (17-7, 9-5 Colonial Athletic Association), who are on a three-game win streak. Danny Schneider scored 11, while Marcus Kitts grabbed 10 rebounds. A free throw from Quinn McDowell gave William & Mary a 51-49 lead with 33 seconds left. But Northeastern's Chaisson Allen responded with a three-point play to give the Huskies a 52-51 advantage with 23 seconds remaining. The Tribe then called timeout, and Brown hit his game-winning jumper. Allen missed a jumper for Northeastern with 1 second left. Allen scored 10 points to lead the Huskies (17-8, 12-2). Northeastern had a four-game win streak snapped.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
